summary: Represents the fourth routine antenatal care visit (ANC4) for pregnant women, delivering scheduled interventions, adjusting care based on gestational age and visit sequence, and arranging subsequent appointments or inpatient admission if complications arise.
business_intent: Provide timely, comprehensive prenatal services at around 30 weeks gestation, ensure appropriate interventions are administered, maintain the antenatal care schedule, and manage potential complications through referral to inpatient care.
